document_data.name: Night's Rest Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Night's Rest Inn''' was an inn located along the [[Triboar Trail]] in the [[Sword Coast North]] region during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Night's Rest Inn was located on the trail, on the way to the town of [[Phandalin]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, a band of [[adventurer]]s visited the Night's Rest Inn and were attacked by [[yuan-ti]] followers of [[Zehir]].
